title: Finsler Geometry: Introduction
speaker: Aritra Bhowmick
description: This series of talks will cover fundamental concepts and recent developments in Finsler Geometry, a generalization of Riemannian geometry where the norm is not necessarily quadratic.
abstract: This introductory talk presents the basics of Finsler Geometry, a generalization of Riemannian geometry where the metric is defined by a Finsler norm. We will explore the historical context, fundamental definitions, and key differences from Riemannian geometry, setting the stage for the series. Let $M$ be a manifold and $\mathbb{R}$ is set of real numbers.

title: Finsler Geometry: Fundamental Concepts
speaker: Aritra Bhowmick
description: This series of talks will cover fundamental concepts and recent developments in Finsler Geometry, a generalization of Riemannian geometry where the norm is not necessarily quadratic.
abstract: This session delves into the core concepts of Finsler Geometry, including the Finsler metric, geodesic equations, and curvature. We will discuss how these concepts extend classical notions and their significance in geometric analysis.

title: Finsler Geometry: Advanced Topics
speaker: Aritra Bhowmick
description: This series of talks will cover fundamental concepts and recent developments in Finsler Geometry, a generalization of Riemannian geometry where the norm is not necessarily quadratic.
abstract: This talk explores advanced topics in Finsler Geometry, such as Chern connections, flag curvature, and their implications for geometric structures. We will also cover recent research trends and open problems in the field.

title: Finsler Geometry: Applications
speaker: Aritra Bhowmick
description: This series of talks will cover fundamental concepts and recent developments in Finsler Geometry, a generalization of Riemannian geometry where the norm is not necessarily quadratic.
abstract: The final talk discusses applications of Finsler Geometry in physics, optimization, and control theory. We will explore practical examples and case studies, highlighting the interdisciplinary impact of Finslerian methods.
